screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Newegg mobile shopping cart with two items: a Razer Huntsman Elite keyboard priced at $169.99 and a refurbished Dell Alienware m15 R4 laptop. The estimated total is $1,668.99. Options are available to edit the protection plan, update item quantities, save items for later, or remove them. A prominent orange button at the bottom allows the user to proceed with a secure checkout.
action_think: The user has requested to empty the shopping cart and add the Logitech G Pro to the cart on Newegg.com before proceeding to checkout. The current screen shows that the cart contains two items, and there is an option to remove them. To fulfill the request, I will first remove both items from the cart before proceeding with adding the Logitech G Pro and completing the checkout process.
action_plan: Remove the Razer Huntsman Elite keyboard from the cart.
Remove the Dell Alienware m15 R4 laptop from the cart.
Search for and add the Logitech G Pro to the cart.
action_desc: Click on the trash icon next to the Razer Huntsman Elite keyboard to remove it from the cart.
action_result: By clicking on the trash bin icon, the laptop previously in the cart has been removed, which is a step towards emptying the shopping cart as requested. This action eliminates the item from the cart, fulfilling part of the user's request to clear it. However, this does not yet complete the request fully, as the user also asked to add a specific item (Logitech G Pro) to the cart and proceed to checkout. Therefore, progress has been made toward the overall goal, but additional actions are needed to add the desired item and proceed to checkout.
prev_action_result:
By clicking on the shopping cart icon located at the top right, you have navigated to the cart page, which displays the items currently in your cart. This action is an essential step towards completing your user request because it allows you to manage and modify the items in your cart, including removing them.

In the current screenshot, you can see the items in the cart: a Razer Huntsman Elite keyboard and a refurbished Dell Alienware laptop. The next step to fulfill your request would be to remove these items from the cart, which would empty the cart.

While this action doesn't fully complete your request yet, it sets the stage to remove the existing items and proceed with adding the Logitech G Pro to the cart. After that, you can move forward to the checkout. So, this action has made progress towards your request but hasn't fully completed it yet.
